summary: Paul Revere & the Raiders were an American pop group who were popular in the 1960s.
full_text: Paul Revere & the Raiders was an American rock band that saw considerable U.S. mainstream success in the second half of the 1960s and early 1970s. Among their hits were the songs "Kicks" , "Hungry" , "Him Or Me - What's It Gonna Be?"  and the Platinum-certified classic No. 1 single "Indian Reservation" .
title: Paul Revere and the Raiders
